title: Noema Core Pure v0.1
description: Minimal semantic nucleus: existence, opaque meaning, abstract visibility

object_id.description: Stable identifier of the semantic object

existence.description: Semantic confirmation that the object is addressable and readable on-chain for interpretation purposes

meaning.description: Opaque semantic descriptor derived exclusively from declared states or verifiable proofs. The Core imposes no structure or ontology.

visibility_abstract.description: Non-normative semantic hint describing general visibility conditions. Not access control.

derived_from.description: Optional non-semantic traceability hint. Not a source of truth and not used in core semantic interpretation.
